entries.name: OpenSSL::Engine.by_id(name) → engineclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Fetches the engine as specified by the id String.

entries.name: OpenSSL::Engine.cleanupclick to toggle source
entries.desc: It is only necessary to run cleanup when engines are loaded via ::load. However, running cleanup before exit is recommended.

entries.name: OpenSSL::Engine.engines → [engine, ...]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns an array of currently loaded engines.

entries.name: OpenSSL::Engine.load(name = nil)click to toggle source
entries.desc: This method loads engines. If name is nil, then all builtin engines are loaded. Otherwise, the given name, as a String,  is loaded if available to your runtime, and returns true. If name is not found, then nil is returned.

entries.name: cipher(name) → OpenSSL::Cipherclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new instance of OpenSSL::Cipher by name, if it is available in this engine.

entries.name: cmds → [["name", "description", "flags"], ...]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns an array of command definitions for the current engine

entries.name: ctrl_cmd(command, value = nil) → engineclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sends the given command to this engine.

entries.name: digest(name) → OpenSSL::Digestclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new instance of OpenSSL::Digest by name.

entries.name: finish → nilclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Releases all internal structural references for this engine.

entries.name: id → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Gets the id for this engine.

entries.name: load_private_key(id = nil, data = nil) → OpenSSL::PKeyclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Loads the given private key identified by id and data.

entries.name: load_public_key(id = nil, data = nil) → OpenSSL::PKeyclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Loads the given public key identified by id and data.

entries.name: name → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Get the descriptive name for this engine.

entries.name: set_default(flag)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Set the defaults for this engine with the given flag.
